info.title: Jellyfin API - MyFlix UI Subset
info.description: Filtered Jellyfin API spec containing only endpoints relevant to MyFlix TV/Mobile UI content display. This reduces context size from ~2MB to ~100KB while covering all UI needs.

get.summary: Get items with filters - PRIMARY ENDPOINT
get.description:
The most versatile endpoint for getting media items. Used for:
- Home rows (genre rows, collection rows)
- Library browsing
- Filtered lists

Common patterns:
- Genre row: includeItemTypes=Movie&genreIds={id}&sortBy=SortName
- Collection items: tags=universe-collection:{slug}
- Recently added: sortBy=DateCreated&sortOrder=Descending

parameters.name: includeItemTypes
parameters.description: Filter by type: Movie, Series, Episode, BoxSet, Season

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter by tags (pipe delimited). Used for Universe Collections: tags=universe-collection:mcu

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Special filters: IsResumable, IsPlayed, IsUnplayed, IsFavorite, Likes

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort field: SortName, DateCreated, DatePlayed, PremiereDate, CommunityRating, Random

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Additional fields: Overview, People, Genres, Studios, Tags, ProviderIds, MediaStreams, Chapters, PrimaryImageAspectRatio, DateCreated, MediaSources, Path

parameters.name: enableImageTypes
parameters.description: Image types to include: Primary, Backdrop, Thumb, Logo, Banner

get.description: Get full details for a movie, series, season, or episode. Used for detail screens.
Returns items with playback progress. Used for the Continue Watching row on home screen.
Returns recently added items. Used for Latest Movies, Latest Shows rows.
Returns the next unwatched episode for each series the user is watching. Used for Next Up row.
Returns all seasons for a TV series. Used for series detail screen.
Returns episodes for a TV series, optionally filtered by season. Used for series/season detail screens.
Returns items similar to the given item. Used for 'More Like This' row on detail screens.
Returns theme music and theme videos for an item. Used for background music on detail screens.
Returns the user's library views (Movies, TV Shows, etc). Used for library navigation.
Returns all genres. Used for genre filtering and genre rows.
Returns persons. Used for cast/crew listings and person filtering.

parameters.name: personTypes
parameters.description: Filter by type: Actor, Director, Writer, Producer

get.description: Returns details for a specific person. Used for person detail screens.
Returns search suggestions/hints. Used for search functionality.
Returns playback URLs and transcoding info. Essential for starting playback.

post.summary: Get playback info with device profile
post.description: Same as GET but allows posting device capabilities for better transcoding decisions.

get.description: Returns skip intro/credits markers. Used for auto-skip functionality.

parameters.name: includeSegmentTypes
parameters.description: Segment types: Intro, Outro, Recap, Preview, Commercial

get.description: Returns intro/preroll videos to play before main content.

post.description: Reports that playback has started. Creates the 'Now Playing' session.
Reports playback position. Should be called every 10 seconds during playback.
Reports that playback has stopped. Clears the 'Now Playing' session.

get.description: Returns user-specific data: played status, favorite, play count, position.

delete.description: Marks an item as not played/unwatched.

get.description: Alias for /Items/{itemId}/Similar for movies.
Alias for /Items/{itemId}/Similar for TV shows.
Returns personalized movie recommendations based on viewing history.
Returns upcoming/airing episodes.
Returns the current authenticated user's info.

post.description: Authenticates user by username and password. Returns access token.

get.description: Returns list of users for login screen (no auth required).
Returns an image for an item. Most common image types: Primary (poster), Backdrop, Thumb, Logo, Banner.

parameters.name: imageType
parameters.description: Primary, Backdrop, Thumb, Logo, Banner, Art, Disc

BaseItemDto.description: The main item DTO. Contains all media item information.

Type.description: Item type: Movie, Series, Season, Episode, BoxSet, Person, Genre

OfficialRating.description: Content rating: PG, PG-13, R, TV-MA, etc.

ImageTags.description: Image tags by type for caching

ChildCount.description: Number of children (seasons for series, episodes for season)

MediaSourceInfo.description: A playable version of an item

MediaStream.description: A video, audio, or subtitle stream

ErrorCode.description: Error code if playback not allowed

ApiKeyAuth.name: X-Emby-Token
ApiKeyAuth.description: Jellyfin API token. Get from Dashboard > API Keys or from AuthenticateUserByName response.
